.program-table {

  margin: 20px 0;
}

.time-column {
  width: 15%;

  padding: 10px;

  color: #2c3e50;
}

.session-block {
  background-color:#f1f4f7;  /* Gray for sessions */
  color: black;
  padding: 10px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

.meal-block {
  background-color: #c7d4e0;  /* Blue for meals */
  color: black;
  padding: 10px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

.date-header {
  background-color: #FFFFFF;  
  color: black;
  padding: 11px;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

.speaker-list {
  margin: 10px 0 0 20px;
}

.speaker-list li {
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
